channel.title: [317] BentonScape Development [317] | 100% Woodcutting | 100% Trading |
channel.description:
Welcome Moparscape. Today Im Posting My First Ever Server Development. Im Pretty New To Coding RuneScape Private Servers Because I Code Software And Program Computers. Please Dont Dislike. I Think Im Quite Good At Coding Already And I Will Hopefully Post Some Pictures. Also I Started From A Completely Blank/Clean Delta Source So Therefor I Havent Leeched This.
Server Features: :) Fixed Trading - 100% Working Fixed Woodcutting - 100% Woking - Correct Logs - Rights Axes - Now Get Logs Not Cash Fixed Some Major Bugs - Where You Name Glitched Out With My Client That I Made From Basicly Nothing Fixed NPC Bugs - Still Need To Add Full Clipping Fixed Noclip Bugs - No Click On An Object And Fly Through The Wall Fixed Port Between Server And Client - Now Port Is: 3333 - My Custom Port Fixed Banking Up A Little - You Can Withdraw With Notes Now Max Cash - 999m Im Changing It To 2147m Max Item - 999m Im Changing It To 2147m Removed All Custom Items - I Think They Suck Fixed Special Attack - Actuly Works 100% - Most Weapons Made Teleports In The Teleport Pad - Might Change Server To Real Teleports Working Prayer - 100% Coding Website & Forums Now Revision Is 317 - Nice And Basic For Me To Code Based On Delta - I Got Told To Use Delta For First Server Started From Blank Added Pk Point System - Just Need To Code A Shop 2 Worlds To Choose From - Just Gotta Gode A JButton In Client For This Feature +Much Much More...
Normal Commands: ::Home ::Shops ::Jad - Still Working On Tz-Tok-Jad ::Pkbox - Coming Soon ::Multi - Free For All Pking ::Pkpoints ::Chill - Player Chill Out Zone ::Starter ::NormalGear ::Runes ::PkGear + More I Cant Remember
Moderator Commands: All Normal Commands + ::Jail [PlayerName] ::Unjail [PlayerName] ::Mute [PlayerName] ::Ban [PlayerName] ::IpMute [PlayerName] ::UnMute [PlayerName] ::ModGear ::Mz - Mod Zone + More I Cant Remember
Administrator Commands: All Normal Commands + All Moderator Commands + ::Npc ::Pnpc ::Npcreset ::IpBan [PlayerName] ::NotedBarrows ::Kill [PlayerName] ::Admin Gear ::Tele [Coord Y] [Coord X] ::XTeleTo [PlayerName] ::XTeleToMe [PlayerName] ::Az - Admin Zone
Owner Commands: All Normal Commands + All Moderator Commands + All Administrator Commands + You Done Need To Know Seeing As Im The Owner Of The Server
Some Pictures: Client Background: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2akjep.png[/img] Home: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fu7s5f.jpg[/img] Woodcutting: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wgvlvt.jpg[/img] Teleports: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/6q86wz.jpg[/img] Skill List: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/szxwsl.jpg[/img] Skilling Zone: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/9s3zet.jpg[/img] Bank: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2lcsrbo.jpg[/img] Prayer Above Head: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/3y9lv.jpg[/img] Admin Zone: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24evswj.jpg[/img]
Thanks For Looking And Please Post Some Suggestions Below It May Look Terrible To You Because In New To RuneScape Private Server Coding And I Am Only About 15-25% Done On The Server.
Credits: 20% DeltaScape - For Blank Source 50% Me - My Own Client 30% Me - Coding The Server
I Will Add Some More Pictures As I Complete New Things To The Server. I am Currently On To Shops And Objects Then Im Doing Safe And Wild Zones Because There Are None At All!
Thanks Please Post Nice Comments Only Because I Didnt Leech If I Started From Blank. Thank You :) Owner And Coder - Joe RuneScape Username - Aint Got One Real RuneScape Is Boring I Like Moparscape Only! Xbox LIVE Username - Arrfer Dubstepz Youtube Channel - ArrferProductionz Website Link: I CANT PUT THIS HERE I DONT THINK SORRY! Forum Like: I CANT PUT THIS HERE I DONT THINK SORRY! Email: BentonScape@Hotmail.Co.uk
Feel Free To Contact Me.

item.title: [317] BentonScape Development [317] | 100% Woodcutting | 100% Trading |
item.dc:creator: @BentonSoft BentonSoft
item.description:
@BentonSoft wrote:

Welcome Moparscape. Today Im Posting My First Ever Server Development. Im Pretty New To Coding RuneScape Private Servers Because I Code Software And Program Computers. Please Dont Dislike. I Think Im Quite Good At Coding Already And I Will Hopefully Post Some Pictures.
Also I Started From A Completely Blank/Clean Delta Source So Therefor I Havent Leeched This.

Server Features:
Fixed Trading - 100% Working
Fixed Woodcutting - 100% Woking - Correct Logs - Rights Axes - Now Get Logs Not Cash
Fixed Some Major Bugs - Where You Name Glitched Out With My Client That I Made From Basicly Nothing
Fixed NPC Bugs - Still Need To Add Full Clipping
Fixed Noclip Bugs - No Click On An Object And Fly Through The Wall
Fixed Port Between Server And Client - Now Port Is: 3333 - My Custom Port
Fixed Banking Up A Little - You Can Withdraw With Notes Now
Max Cash - 999m Im Changing It To 2147m
Max Item - 999m Im Changing It To 2147m
Removed All Custom Items - I Think They Suck
Fixed Special Attack - Actuly Works 100% - Most Weapons
Made Teleports In The Teleport Pad - Might Change Server To Real Teleports
Working Prayer - 100%
Coding Website & Forums Now
Revision Is 317 - Nice And Basic For Me To Code
Based On Delta - I Got Told To Use Delta For First Server
Started From Blank
Added Pk Point System - Just Need To Code A Shop
2 Worlds To Choose From - Just Gotta Gode A JButton In Client For This Feature
+Much Much More…

Normal Commands:
::Home
::Shops
::Jad - Still Working On Tz-Tok-Jad
::Pkbox - Coming Soon
::Multi - Free For All Pking
::Pkpoints
::Chill - Player Chill Out Zone
::Starter
::NormalGear
::Runes
::PkGear

  • More I Cant Remember

Moderator Commands:
All Normal Commands +
::Jail [PlayerName]
::Unjail [PlayerName]
::Mute [PlayerName]
::Ban [PlayerName]
::IpMute [PlayerName]
::UnMute [PlayerName]
::ModGear
::Mz - Mod Zone

  • More I Cant Remember

Administrator Commands:
All Normal Commands +
All Moderator Commands +
::Npc
::Pnpc
::Npcreset
::IpBan [PlayerName]
::NotedBarrows
::Kill [PlayerName]
::Admin Gear
::Tele [Coord Y] [Coord X]
::XTeleTo [PlayerName]
::XTeleToMe [PlayerName]
::Az - Admin Zone

Owner Commands:
All Normal Commands +
All Moderator Commands +
All Administrator Commands +
You Done Need To Know Seeing As Im The Owner Of The Server
